jetpack-related-posts.title: Shipyard Acquaint Course – Piraeus
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Target Audience With a specific focus to people working in Marine Claims Course Summary A short intensive three day course with the aim of introducing marine insurance professionals to the basic technical aspects of damage encountered in marine losses, their surveying, investigating and reporting techniques. Course Objectives The course is…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Falmouth Port & Shipyard Familiarisation Course
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Course Summary AqualisBraemar's technical division offer a short intensive two day course with the aim of introducing marine insurance professionals to the basic technical aspects of damage encountered in marine losses, their surveying, investigating, reporting techniques and general overview of marine insurance. jetpack-related-posts.title: Ship Familiarisation Course – Dubai
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Course Summary Drydocks World Dubai, Jebel Ali Port and Mubarak Marine, together with AqualisBraemar, have organised a Ship Familiarisation Course targeted at the local and international shipping industry and intended to familiarize professionals in the industry with ships, ship repair, casualties and have a more hands on view of the…
